<h3>Welcome</h3>
<p>This site holds a collection of applications and utility programs that I have written through the years. Feel free to browse and see if you find anything of interest. Most, if not all of the applications are released under the GNU General Public License, <a href="licenses/gpl-2.0.txt">version 2</a> or <a href="licenses/gpl-3.0.txt">version 3</a>.</p>
<p>For updates and comments on my work, please visit my <a href="http://catacombae.blogspot.com" target="_blank">blog</a>. For easy access to relevant source code, I have an <a href="http://sourceforge.net/projects/catacombae/" target="_blank">account at sourceforge</a>.</p>
<p>These projects take up a lot of time, and I'm working on them all by myself. So if you find them useful, and have some money to spare, feel free to donate some to my development efforts. Any amount will be appreciated. Also, if you have any non-trivial feature request for my apps, that can also be discussed together with a donation. (Of course, you can request features without donating, but then I can't make any promises...)</p>
<form action="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr" method="post" target="_top">

<h3>Updates</h3>
<h5>
2015-10-13 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer 0.23.1</a> is released. See <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt">changelog</a> for details.<br/>
2015-01-09 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer 0.23</a> is released. See <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt">changelog</a> for details.<br/>
2014-08-25 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer 0.22.1</a> is released. See <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt">changelog</a> for details.<br/>
2014-08-18 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer 0.22</a> is released. See <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt">changelog</a> for details.<br/>
2009-07-14 - <a href="other/#jfuse" target="_self">jFUSE 0.1</a> is released.<br/>
2008-12-23 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer 0.21</a> is released. See <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt">changelog</a> for details.<br/>
2008-11-10 - <a href="dmgextractor/" target="_self">DMGExtractor 0.70</a> released, supporting encrypted .dmg files. See <a href="dmgextractor/changelog.txt">changelog</a>.<br/>
2008-11-07 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer 0.20.1</a>, a minor bugfix version, is released. See <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt">changelog</a>.<br/>
2008-11-04 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer 0.20</a> released with HFS, encryption and symlink support. See <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt">changelog</a>.<br/>
2008-09-06 - <a href="other/#dua" target="_self">DiskUsageAnalyzer</a> 1.00 is released. See <a href="diskusageanalyzer/changelog.txt">changelog</a> for details.<br/>
2008-07-18 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer 0.19.5</a> released. See <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt">changelog</a> for details.<br/>
2007-11-14 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer 0.19</a> released with HFSX support, caching and support for bzip2 dmgs.<br/>
2007-10-05 - I have started to maintain an <a href="http://macntfs-3g.blogspot.com" target="_blank">NTFS-3G package for Mac OS X</a>.<br/>
2007-09-08 - <a href="http://catacombae.blogspot.com" target="_blank">Blog</a> created.<br/>
2007-08-31 - <a href="dmgextractor/" target="_self">DMGExtractor</a> 0.60 is released with bzip2 compression support. See <a href="dmgextractor/changelog.txt">changelog</a>.<br/>
2007-07-31 - <a href="other/#dua" target="_self">DiskUsageAnalyzer</a> 0.80 is released. See link for details.<br/>
2007-07-26 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer</a> 0.18.3 is out. Read <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt" target="_self">changelog</a>.<br/>
2007-07-23 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer</a> 0.18.2 is out. Read <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt" target="_self">changelog</a>.<br/>
2007-07-12 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer</a> 0.18.1 is out. Read <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt" target="_self">changelog</a>.<br/>
2007-06-29 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer</a> 0.18 is out. Read <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt" target="_self">changelog</a>.<br/>
2007-04-07 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer</a> 0.17 is out, with .dmg file support. Read <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt" target="_self">changelog</a>.<br/>
2007-04-03 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer</a> 0.16 is out. Read <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt" target="_self">changelog</a>.<br/>
2007-03-28 - <a href="hfsexplorer/" target="_self">HFSExplorer</a> 0.15 is out, fixing a few bugs and adding/polishing some UI features.<br/>
2007-03-13 - Posted <a href="rartools/#rarfs" target="_self">rarfs_fuse</a>, a program for mounting RAR archives inside a file system.<br/>
2007-02-04 - New version of HFSExplorer out. Latest version is now 0.11. Read <a href="hfsexplorer/changelog.txt" target="_self">changelog</a> for details.<br/>
2007-02-03 - Added a section for smaller utility programs, and posted FindDuplicates as the first.</h5>
